divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my front porch looking east, toward greentown, watching the fireworks show when i noticed something that didn't look like an fireworks i have ever seen. it was a white ball of light, about 1\10 the size of the nearly full moon it was about 45 degrees above the horizon and was moving fast across the sky. it did not appear to be upp in the atmosphere but rather pretty close to the ground. it had a trail behind it like a comet's tail almost. it was traveling from north to south. the coyotes were going crazy and have been since dusk.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sharpsville
There were no other sightings in Sharpsville on or around July 5th 2009
Summary: Large white ball of light zips through sky.
